title: Cyprus backs 'painful' bailout deal
description: The government of Cyprus has defended a 10bn-euro bailout deal to save its banks from collapse, amid warnings the island faces deep recession
content:
The government of Cyprus has defended a 10bn-euro bailout deal to save its banks from collapse, amid warnings the island faces deep recession.

The agreement protects small savers but depositors with more than 100,000 euros ($130,000; Â£85,000), many of whom are Russian, face big losses.

There was relief in Cyprus that small depositors have been protected, but the deal comes at a heavy price.
